name: This Is Not Chess (itch)
description:
This Is Not Chess is a turn-based tactics game where squads of goofy characters duke it out for dominance.

While the wizard is flinging spells and the swordsman slashes, the jester throws his custard pies and the robotic stalker waits for its chance to pounce! Let loose in this melting pot of madness!

  • Turn-based tactics, how do you spend your actions?
  • Wide variety of goofy and unusual characters duking it out across grid-based battlefields.
  • Silly story about a group of friends on a quest for glory.
  • Challenge mode where you create your squad and take on predefined battles.
  • Local skirmish mode with multiple teams, customisable winning conditions atop randomised or preset maps.
  • Inbuilt editors that let you create your own units, maps and campaigns!

This Is Not Chess is currently in development, with the roughness that comes with it. However the core gameplay is set and there's already a hearty handful of maps and characters to battle with. The full version is intended to have the bugs squashed, a campaign spanning roughly twenty-five levels and as many challenge levels available.
